title: Incorporate It Into Our Daily Routine!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Rin-san! I saw your livestream!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeeh!? You watched it, Dia-san!? How was it, how was it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It was a very energizing stream that is very like you, Rin-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe~. Rin also wants everyone to be energetic, so it’s a big success nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>The segment on how to build up physical strength in everyday life was very helpful. I’ve been practicing it with Ruby.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Waah! Ruby-chan too!? Rin is a little embarrassed nya....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Have confidence! Once it becomes a habit, you can build up your fitness while doing your daily routines without thinking of it as a painful process. I believe that is a very wonderful thing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Y-, you’re exaggerating nya....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>No, I’m not exaggerating. I’ve been thinking of discussing this with Kanan-san and Mari-san and incorporating it into Aqours as a whole.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin is starting to feel like Rin needs to work harder too.... Dia-san, Rin will try my best to bring more useful things for everyone, so watch my stream again nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
